titleStmt.title: Physician cure thy self: or, An answer to a seditious pamphlet, entitled Eye-salve for the English Army, &c. VVritten and publish'd for the information and benefit of the souldjery; and to them directed. April 23. 1660.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H.B. at the Gun in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
